EmailTemplate.name: ES-2016-12-19-December Partner Newsletter.November 2016 Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: December Partner Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
In This Issue:
- VDI Promotion - Turbonomic Certification Opportunity
- Autonomic Intelligence Has Arrived - Looking Ahead to 2017
VDI Promotion
VDI places significant demands on the underlying compute, storage and network infrastructure. Assuring end-users receive an experience equivalent to that of a physical desktop is a challenge. Turbonomic manages the significant resource demands and fluctuations which often stall VDI deployments by continuously assuring Virtual Desktops get the resources they need, when they need them.
Until January 31st, 2017, partners who bring Turbonomic to a customer with a VDI environment will receive an additional 10% discount on their Turbonomic list price. Simply register your opportunity in the Turbonomic Partner Portal to receive this offer. PLUS! Partners will receive an additional 10% off their transfer price on any subsequent deal that closes within 90 days of the VDI deal. <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-3786]]>
Additional VDI specific collateral and information available in the Partner Portal <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-3960]]>.
Turbonomic Certification Opportunity
Do you want more expertise in the Turbonomic technology and the ability to leverage Turbonomic to its fullest potential? Turbonomic's ACE training program signifies the mastery of Turbonomic technology and its autonomic control system actions, including knowledge of all dashboards, administration, ,plan function, and reservations and deployment. To be certified, individuals must complete a two-day course and pass multiple-choice and practical exams.
Those who are ACE certified join a growing community of thought leaders in virtualization and cloud management. They earn 500 points in the Green Circle Community and are eligible to pursue further levels of certification. These levels include Turbonomic ACE Professional, an under-the-covers examination of the Turbonomic platform. Turbonomic has recently announced its new ACE Master Certification which will focus even more deeply into emerging technologies.
Turbonomic is offering courses in New York in January and February of 2017. For more details on how to register, you can find the ACE registration page here <[[https://turbonomic.com/training-and-services/certification/]]>.
The Age of Autonomic Intelligence Has Arrived
"For those who do embrace it, Autonomic Intelligence will not only augment but unleash human intelligence." - Ben Nye, CEO, Turbonomic. In this article <[[https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/age-autonomic-intelligence-has-arrived-ben-nye?trk=hp-feed-article-title-like]]>, Nye explains that autonomic intelligence is revolutionizing our lives and how Turbonomic is helping to drive this revolution.
Looking Ahead to 2017
New year, same challenges. Do your customers face any of the following challenges? How are you planning on helping them solve for their daily pain points? Find out how bringing Turbonomic into your customers environment will transform their operational phases of plan, build, and run across all projects and initiatives.
- Private Cloud <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/private-cloud-management/]]> - Public Cloud <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/public-cloud-management/]]> - Hybrid Cloud <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/hybrid-cloud-management/]]> - DevOps <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/devops/]]> - Data Center Migration <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/data-center-migration/]]> - VDI Management <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/vdi-management/]]> - Hyper-Converged <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/hyper-converged-infrastructure/]]> - Assure QoS Adherence <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/qos-assurance/]]> - Reduce Network Latency <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/reduce-network-latency/]]> - Minimize Storage Latency <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/minimize-storage-latency/]]> - Multi-Cloud Management <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/multi-cloud-management/]]> - Reduce Licensing Cost <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/reduce-licensing-costs/]]> - Capacity Planning & Management <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/capacity-planning-management/]]> - Converged Infrastructure <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/build-converged-infrastructure/]]> - Intelligent Workload Management <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/intelligent-workload-management/]]>
We hope you have Happy Holidays and a Happy New Year! We look forward to working with you all in 2017. Welcome New Customers
Join the Green Circle
Join the Green Circle Today <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome?inviteID=12005]]>! The Green Circle is our online community where you can access all resources, like training materials, industry insight, informative forums and make the most of your partnership with Turbonomic.

Questions?
If you have any questions please email us at partners@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:partners@turbonomic.com]]>. We always appreciate your feedback so feel free to send us suggestions on how to improve our partner program or request resources that you would like to see.
